attributes.action: Cap the cost of PCR tests, Day 2 and day 8 tests and Test to release tests
attributes.additional_details:
Other countries, like Greece, have capped the cost of their coronavirus tests to 60 euros. 

To save the British public and visitors from being 'ripped off', we should be doing something similar!

Many other countries have the ability to offer the same tests for a fraction of the cost.
attributes.background: I want the British government to impose a cost cap on all forms of coronavirus testing in the UK.

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for the price of medical services provided privately, but you may wish to sign this petition calling for a related action: 

Lower the price of the £210 COVID Home Test Kits for travellers entering the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575509

You could have a petition calling on the Government to make PCR tests available at a fixed or no cost, if that's something you want to happen.
